chapter.title: Package Building
chapter.para: If you want to create an own OPM package (.opm) you need to create a spec file (.sopm) which includes necessary properties of the package. After that you need to build it to get a OPM package.

sect1.title: Package Spec File
sect1.para: The OPM package is XML based. So you can create/edit the .sopm via a text or xml editor. It contains meta data, a file list and database options.

sect2.title: Name
sect2.para: The package name (required).

sect2.title: Verion
sect2.para: The package version (required).

sect2.title: Framework
sect2.para: The required framework version (2.0.x means e.g. 2.0.1 or 2.0.9) (required).

sect2.title: Vendor
sect2.para: The package vendor (requred).

sect2.title: URL
sect2.para: The vendor URL (required).

sect2.title: License
sect2.para: The license of the package (required).

sect2.title: ChangeLog
sect2.para: The package change log (optional).
sect2.programlisting: <ChangeLog>2005-12-02 added change log</ChangeLog> <ChangeLog>2005-12-02 v1.1 New package</ChangeLog>

sect2.title: Description
sect2.para: The package description in different languages (required).
sect2.programlisting: <Description Lang="en">A web calendar.</Description> <Description Lang="de">Ein Web Kalender.</Description>

sect2.title: BuildHost
sect2.para: This will be filled up automatically by OPM (auto).

sect2.title: BuildDate
sect2.para: This will be filled up automatically by OPM (auto).

sect2.title: PackageRequired
sect2.para: Required packages needs to be installed before (optional).

sect2.title: OS (^M)
sect2.para: Required OS (optional).

sect2.title: Filelist
sect2.para: This is a file of included file of the package (optional).

sect2.title: DatabaseInstall
sect2.para: Install (if a package get installed), (optional).
sect2.programlisting: <DatabaseInstall> <TableCreate Name="calendar_event"> <Column Name="id" Required="true" PrimaryKey="true" AutoIncrement="true" Type="BIGINT"/> <Column Name="title" Required="true" Size="250" Type="VARCHAR"/> <Column Name="content" Required="false" Size="250" Type="VARCHAR"/> <Column Name="start_time" Required="true" Type="DATE"/> <Column Name="end_time" Required="true" Type="DATE"/> <Column Name="owner_id" Required="true" Type="INTEGER"/> <Column Name="event_status" Required="true" Size="50" Type="VARCHAR"/> </TableCreate> </DatabaseInstall>

sect2.title: DatabaseUpgrade
sect2.para: Upgrade (if a package gets upgraded, take care of the Version Tag in the database actions, this means if the installed package version is below 1.3.4, then this database action will be performed), (optional).
sect2.programlisting: <DatabaseUpgrade Version="1.3.4"> <TableCreate Name="calendar_event_involved" Version="1.3.4"> <Column Name="event_id" Required="true" Type="BIGINT"/> <Column Name="user_id" Required="true" Type="INTEGER"/> </TableCreate> </DatabaseUpgrade>

sect2.title: DatabaseReinstall
sect2.para: Reinstall (if a package is installed and gets reinstalled), (optional).

sect2.title: DatabaseUninstall
sect2.para: Uninstall (if a package gets uninstalled), (optional).

sect2.title: CodeInstall
sect2.para: To execute perl code if the package gets installed (optional).
sect2.programlisting:
<CodeInstall>
    # example
    if (1) {
        print STDERR "Some info to STDERR\n";
    }
    # log example
    $Self->{LogObject}->Log(
        Priority => 'notice',
        Message => "Some Message!",
    )
    # database example
    $Self->{DBObject}->Do(SQL => "SOME SQL");
</CodeInstall>

sect2.title: CodeUninstall
sect2.para: To execute perl code if the package gets uninstalled (optional).
sect2.programlisting:
<CodeUninstall>
    # example
    if (1) {
        print STDERR "Some info to STDERR\n";
    }
</CodeUninstall>

sect2.title: CodeReinstall
sect2.para: To execute perl code if the package gets reinstalled (optional).
sect2.programlisting:
<CodeReinstall>
    # example
    if (1) {
        print STDERR "Some info to STDERR\n";
    }
</CodeReinstall>

sect2.title: CodeUpgrade
sect2.para: To execute perl code if the package gets upgraded (optional).
sect2.programlisting:
<CodeUpgrade>
    # example
    if (1) {
        print STDERR "Some info to STDERR\n";
    }
</CodeUpgrade>

sect1.title: Example .sopm
sect1.para: This is a whole example spec file.
sect1.programlisting: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <otrs_package version="1.0"> <Name>Calendar</Name> <Version>0.0.1</Version> <Framework>2.0.x</Framework> <Vendor>OTRS GmbH</Vendor> <URL>http://otrs.org/</URL> <License>GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2, June 1991</License> <ChangeLog>2005-12-02 added change log</ChangeLog> <ChangeLog>2005-12-02 v1.1 New package</ChangeLog> <Description Lang="en">A web calendar.</Description> <Description Lang="de">Ein Web Kalender.</Description> <BuildDate>?</BuildDate> <BuildHost>?</BuildHost> <Filelist> <File Permission="644" Location="Kernel/Config/Files/Calendar.pm"></File> <File Permission="644" Location="Kernel/System/CalendarEvent.pm"></File> <File Permission="644" Location="Kernel/Modules/AgentCalendar.pm"></File> <File Permission="644" Location="Kernel/Language/de_AgentCalendar.pm"></File> <File Permission="644" Location="Kernel/Output/HTML/Standard/AgentCalendar.dtl"></File> <File Permission="644" Location="Kernel/Output/HTML/NotificationCalendar.pm"></File> <File Permission="644" Location="var/httpd/htdocs/images/Standard/calendar.png"></File> </Filelist> <DatabaseInstall> <TableCreate Name="calendar_event"> <Column Name="id" Required="true" PrimaryKey="true" AutoIncrement="true" Type="BIGINT"/> <Column Name="title" Required="true" Size="250" Type="VARCHAR"/> <Column Name="content" Required="false" Size="250" Type="VARCHAR"/> <Column Name="start_time" Required="true" Type="DATE"/> <Column Name="end_time" Required="true" Type="DATE"/> <Column Name="owner_id" Required="true" Type="INTEGER"/> <Column Name="event_status" Required="true" Size="50" Type="VARCHAR"/> </TableCreate> </DatabaseInstall> <DatabaseReinstall></DatabaseReinstall> <DatabaseUninstall> <TableDrop Name="calendar_event"/> </DatabaseUninstall> </otrs_package>
